name: Noobees
description:
This is a trial version of the program developed in 7 days . It represents the collective consciousness of bees , you will lead almost the entire bee swarm . The world will be randomly generated depending on your stage [ There are 6 stages in the program in total ] . At the moment , there are 4 types of bees in the game , 6 types of opponents [ Wasps and other insects ] .

The worker is your first initial bee and the most important one , she collects honey from the flowers and takes it back to the nearest hive .

Power : 2

A soldier is your military unit automatically if he sees an enemy flying towards him .

Power : 6

Princess - with her help you are able to create additional hives , extremely weak .

Power : 1

The queen is flying around the hive , all the bees except the princesses are starting to spin like a cursor , you can 't control the bees that have a queen .

Power : 8

The number of enemies depends on the stage and on the number of hives .

Your goal is to reach stage 6 and defeat the parasitic wasp queen .
